description: Department store custodian Lance Hart has fallen for a beautiful woman. A woman no one else knows exists. Salina Samone makes her stunning debut in this parody of an 80's classic movie. This update includes wet foot, toe, and leg worship, blowjob, and lots of hard fucking by this gorgeous TS newcomer. Could a fantasy this perfect ever be real? Happy Valentine's Day everyone!
title: A Magical TS Valentine
